title: VMware, Other Tech Giants Announce Push for Confidential Computing Standards
description:
VMware partners with tech giants to accelerate the development of confidential computing applications.

The post VMware, Other Tech Giants Announce Push for Confidential Computing Standards appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Apple, Civil Liberty Groups Condemn UK Online Safety Bill
description:
Fears mount that UK Online Safety Bill may include a requirement for an encrypted message scanning capability.

The post Apple, Civil Liberty Groups Condemn UK Online Safety Bill appeared first on SecurityWeek.
